definition: كفالة kafāla bail, guaranty, security, sponsorship; pledge, deposit, surety, collateral │ كفالة مالية (mālīya) surety, security; bail; caution money; كفالة بالنفس (nafs) bail (esp. for due appearance of a person in court; Isl. Law); في كفالة فلان under the protection or tutelage of s.o., in s.o.’s custody
